# Documentation Generation

**Context:** Loaded when user requests documentation ("gerar documentação", "documentation", "criar readme", "guide").

## Agents in This Category

- **[Documentation Generator](agent-prompt.md)** - Generates README, setup guides, API docs, and migration reports

## When to Load This Agent

```
#file .github/agents/documentation/agent-prompt.md
```

**Tip:** See `agent-prompt.md` for supported documentation types and templates.
